005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026public final class ArraySubarray {
027  private static final String NAME = "subarray";
028  @NonNull
029  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
030      .name(NAME)
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextIndependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("array")
037          .type(IArrayItem.class)
038          .one()
039          .build())
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("start")
042          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
043          .one()
044          .build())
045      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
046      .returnOne()
047      .functionHandler(ArraySubarray::executeTwoArg)
048      .build();
049  @NonNull
050  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
051      .name(NAME)
052      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
053      .deterministic()
054      .contextIndependent()
055      .focusIndependent()
056      .argument(IArgument.builder()
057          .name("array")
058          .type(IArrayItem.class)
059          .one()
060          .build())
061      .argument(IArgument.builder()
062          .name("start")
063          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
064          .one()
065          .build())
066      .argument(IArgument.builder()
067          .name("length")
068          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
069          .one()
070          .build())
071      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
072      .returnOne()
073      .functionHandler(ArraySubarray::executeThreeArg)
074      .build();
075
076  private ArraySubarray() {
077    // disable construction
078  }
079
080  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
081  @NonNull
082  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> executeTwoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
083      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
084      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
085      IItem focus) {
086    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
087        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
088    IIntegerItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
089
090    return ISequence.of(subarray(array, start));
091  }
092
093  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
094  @NonNull
095  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> executeThreeArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
096      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
097      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
098      IItem focus) {
099    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
100        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
101    IIntegerItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
102    IIntegerItem length = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
103
104    return ISequence.of(subarray(array, start, length));
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
109   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
110   *
111   * @param <T>
112   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
113   * @param array
114   *          the target Metapath array
115   * @param startItem
116   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
117   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
118   * @throws ArrayException
119   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
120   */
121  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
122  @NonNull
123  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
124      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
125      @NonNull IIntegerItem startItem) {
126    return subarray(array, startItem.asInteger().intValueExact());
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
131   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
132   *
133   * @param <T>
134   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
135   * @param array
136   *          the target Metapath array
137   * @param startItem
138   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
139   * @param lengthItem
140   *          the integer count of items to include starting with the item at the
141   *          start position
142   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
143   * @throws ArrayException
144   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
145   *           to array:size
146   */
147  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
148  @NonNull
149  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
150      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
151      @NonNull IIntegerItem startItem,
152      @NonNull IIntegerItem lengthItem) {
153    return subarray(array, startItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), lengthItem.asInteger().intValueExact());
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
158   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
159   *
160   * @param <T>
161   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
162   * @param array
163   *          the target Metapath array
164   * @param start
165   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
166   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
167   * @throws ArrayException
168   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
169   *           to array:size
170   */
171  @NonNull
172  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
173      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
174      int start) {
175    return subarray(array, start, array.size() - start + 1);
176  }
177
178  /**
179   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
180   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
181   *
182   * @param <T>
183   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
184   * @param array
185   *          the target Metapath array
186   * @param start
187   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
188   * @param length
189   *          the integer count of items to include starting with the item at the
190   *          start position
191   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
192   * @throws ArrayException
193   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
194   *           to array:size
195   */
196  @NonNull
197  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
198      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
199      int start,
200      int length) {
201    if (length < 0) {
202      throw new ArrayException(
203          ArrayException.NEGATIVE_ARRAY_LENGTH, String.format("The length '%d' is negative.", length));
204    }
205
206    List<T> copy;
207    try {
208      copy = array.subList(start - 1, start - 1 + length);
209    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
210      throw new ArrayException(
211          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
212          String.format("The start + length (%d + %d) exceeds the array length '%d'.",
213              start,
214              length,
215              array.size()),
216          ex);
217    }
218
219    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(new ArrayList<>(copy));
220  }
221}
